# This .gitignore file should be placed at the root of your Unity project directory

# Ignore the Library directory
/Library/

# Ignore all files and folders starting with a dot
.*

# Ignore temp files, build outputs, and previous builds
/Temp/
/Build/
/Builds/
/Logs/
/UserSettings/

# Ignore Visual Studio cache files
.vs/
/*.userprefs
/*.csproj
/*.sln
/*.suo
/*.tmp
/*.user
/*.userosscache
/*.unityproj
/*.pidb
/*.booproj
/*.svd
/*.pdb
/*.opendb
/*.VC.db

# Ignore macOS metadata
.DS_Store
.AppleDouble
.LSOverride

# Thumbnails
/*.thumb

# Ignore Crashlytics generated files
/crashlytics-build.properties

# Ignore exported asset packages
/*.exportpackage

# Autogenerated Jetbrains Rider files
.idea/
/*.sln.iml

# Ignore node modules
/node_modules/

# Ignore builds
/[Bb]uilds/

# Ignore auto-generated documentation files
/xmlDoc/
